Label: Manuscript
Suggested description: Handwritten documents, particularly books and other documents created before the invention of mechanical printing
Usage/constraints: Here, this refers to a representation of an instance that is pointed to by the DS 2.0 Record entity [Q3], using the "described manuscript" predicate [P3]
Notes: Connector/buffer node between DS2.0 Record and Holding entities; clearly demarcates descriptive from administrative metadata

Label: Holding
Current description: Holding of a manuscript in an organization etc.
Suggested description: Instance of a manuscript that is held and maintained by an institution
Notes: Main node for connecting to metadata about holding institutions (administrative metadata)

Label: DS 2.0 Record
Suggested description: An instance of a metadata record that has been transformed to conform to the DS 2.0 data model

Label: Current
Suggested description: Describes a holding record that is current

Label: Non-Current
Suggested description: Describes a holding record that is out-of-date

Label: Standard Title
Current description: A standard (non-authoritative) string title to facilitate search (e.g., Bible, City of God, Metaphysics). Note: a Standard Title is a string value that does not designate a work; e.g., 'De rerum natura.', which can represent several works
Usage/constraints: Applied as qualifier value to following property statement: title as recorded [P10]

Label: Actor (Name Authority)
Suggested description: An instance and normalized appellation of a person, either an individual or group, who acts on an object in an intentional way
Usage/constraints: Applied as qualifier to following property statement:

Label: Personal (Name Authority)
Suggested description: An instance and normalized appellation of an individual who acts on an object in an intentional way

Label: Corporate (Name Authority)
Suggested description: An instance and normalized appellation of a group, an organizational or corporate entity, that acts on an object in an intentional way

Label: Role (Authority File)
Current description: Role of an actor related to a manuscript
Suggested description: A defined way in which an actor relates to a manuscript, e.g., as former owner or author
Usage/constraints: Will take value of pre-defined entity with QID (a controlled list of terms, i.e., scribe, artist, author, etc.[Q18:21])

Label: Term (Authority File)
Current description: An authorized subject, named subject, genre, form, or other term
Usage/constraints: Applied as qualifier value to following property statement: "term in authority file" [P20], which is itself a qualified property of "genre as recorded" [P18]

Label: Language (Authority File)
Current description: Language in which the text of the manuscript is written
Suggested description: Preferred (authoritative) term for the language in which the text of the manuscript is written
Usage/constraints: Applied as qualifier value to following property statement: "language in authority file" [P21], which is itself a qualified property of "language as recorded" [P22]

Label: Century (Authority File)
Suggested description: A unit of time lasting 100 years, selected from a controlled authorized listing
Usage/constraints: Applied as qualifier value using P24, "production century as recorded," which modifies the string value associated with P23, "production date as recorded"; takes QID/item as value [Q54:Q105]
Claim(s) to add: Data type (item)| Q13 P42 "Q579" #has Wikidata QID "Q579"

Label: Dated
Suggested description: Describes a record that has a date assertion

Label: Non-dated
Suggested description: Describes a record that has no date assertion

Label: Place (Authority File)
Suggested description: Refers to a historical named place, area, or current geographical location
Usage/constraints: Takes authority file URI as value

Label: Material (Authority File)
Current description: Physical medium of manuscript (parchment, paper, etc.)
Usage/constraints: Will take value of pre-defined entity with QID (generated from a controlled list [Q22-Q38])

Label: Author
Suggested description: Person(s) who create the intellectual content and compose text of manuscripts

Label: Artist
Suggested description: Person(s) who illustrate or otherwise produce visual work for manuscripts

Label: Scribe
Suggested description: Person(s) responsible for transcribing, copying, and editing manuscripts

Label: Former owner
Suggested description: Person(s) who at some point held legal title to a manuscript object

Label: Associated agent
Suggested description: An entity that has the power to act in the world of discourse (for example, a person or a group of people) that is associated with some other actor
Usage/constraints: has an "instance of" claim that should be a "subclass of" claim?
